column4: can anyone explain to me why i cannot get pidgin to iconify in stalonetray, is there a setting that i may have over looked (other prog iconify like xchat and gufw)?
if I remembered, I'd tell you, but since I don't, I'd have to open the pidgin preferences window and go through all the tabs
I just remember that there _is_ a setting, since I'd toggled it not more than a few months ago
